frameworks: Nginx (static web server; Docker base image `nginx:latest`)
architectural_resources: Static website/web application served by Nginx container
Container image registry (GitLab Container Registry; referenced in `.gitlab-ci.yml`)
CI/CD pipeline (GitLab CI stages: build_and_push, deploy)
Compute instance/VM for hosting containers (AWS EC2; referenced in README and `.gitlab-ci.yml` SSH target)
Networking: HTTP/HTTPS exposure (ports 80/443 exposed in Dockerfile and published in `docker run`)
SSH key/secret management for deployment (SSH_PRIVATE_KEY CI variable used in `.gitlab-ci.yml`)
